author: Simon Difford
description: Made with a quality cachaça, a freshly squeezed ripe lemon and a raw honey syrup this simple cocktail is deliciously refreshing.
name: Lemon Beat
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
